snippet: David Simon, the writer/producer of shows like "The Wire," has commented on the Maryland politician who tried to silence a Ravens player over his stance on gay marriage.
abstract: David Simon, the writer/producer of shows like "The Wire," has commented on the Maryland politician who tried to silence a Ravens player over his stance on gay marriage.

headline.main: David Simon on Ravens, Gay Marriage and Free Speech
